query: 过正方形ABCD的顶点作直线l,分别过A、C作L的垂线,垂足为E、F,若AE=3,CF=1,则AB=()选项：['1', '2', '√{10}', '4']
answer: 解:∵正方形ABCD,∴AB=BC,∠ABC=90°,∴∠ABE+∠CBF=90°,∵AE⊥BF,∴∠ABE+∠BAE=90°,∴∠CBF=∠BAE,∵在△AEB和△BFC中,\begin{cases}∠BAE=∠CBF∠AEB=∠BFC=90{^°}AB=BC\end{cases},∴△AEB≌△BFC(AAS),∴AE=BF=3,BE=CF=1,在Rt△ABE中,根据勾股定理得:AB=√{AE²+BE²}=√{3²+1²}=√{10}．故选:C．
